about_the_game:
What's in the demo?

One procedurally generated level: Each playthrough is different depending on what upgrades you choose and how the stage evolves. You never know what might happen.

14 unique weapons: Try out each weapon and find your favorite playstyle. While the guns may seem simple at first, how you choose to place them can greatly impact your success or failure.

One boss fight: The stage ends with a tough-as-nails boss fight that will challenge what you've learned so far.

Control dozens of guns with your mind!

Fully Dogomatic is a top-down auto-shooter where you play as a psychic corgi who controls guns with their mind. While you can carry as many guns as your heart desires, you can’t change where you aim a gun after you pick it up, so choose wisely!

Face off against hoards of enemies: Hundreds of enemies will attack you at once.

Collect as many guns as your heart desires: This isn't like other shooters where you change between a couple of guns. Collect as many as you can and create a ring of death around you.

Fully customizable weapons: There are tons of upgrades and attachments you can use to improve your guns. Get creative and design the deadliest weapons you can.

Simple and Intuitive: Fully Dogomatic is for the people. Whether you've been playing games for days or decades, anyone can quickly learn how to play. You can play with a keyboard, a mouse, or a gamepad.

name: Fully Dogomatic Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: An auto shooter where you create a ring of guns around you to mow down thousands of enemies! You may be an adorable corgi, but that won't stop you from designing the ultimate arsenal of fully customizable weaponry.
